content: I am a second year Computer Science PhD student at Boston University. Before joining BU, I received a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science at the American University of Beirut, Lebanon. I am keenly interested in machine learning and computer vision. I am currently working on an explainable AI research project with Professor Sarah Adel Bargal, and on cross-layer parameter sharing with Professor Bryan Plummer.
summary: I am a second year Computer Science PhD student at Boston University. Before joining BU, I received a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science at the American University of Beirut, Lebanon. I am keenly interested in machine learning and computer vision.
title: Diala Lteif
